name: SCUM Dedicated Server (Wine) [No Anticheat]
author: datag8r
description: Runs the SCUM dedicated server via Wine using SteamCMD and anonymous login.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update

mkdir -p /steamcmd && cd /steamcmd
curl -sqL "https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz" | tar zxvf -

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: Port used by the SCUM server
